WarlockSpells.Name: Charm Person
WarlockSpells.Description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Comprehend Languages
WarlockSpells.Description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear.

WarlockSpells.Name: Expeditious Retreat
WarlockSpells.Description: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace.

WarlockSpells.Name: Hellish Rebuke
WarlockSpells.Description: You point your finger, and the creature that damaged you is momentarily surrounded by hellish flames.

WarlockSpells.Name: Illusory Script
WarlockSpells.Description: You write on parchment, paper, or some other suitable writing material and imbue it with a potent illusion.

WarlockSpells.Name: Protection from Evil and Good
WarlockSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is protected against certain types of creatures.

WarlockSpells.Name: Unseen Servant
WarlockSpells.Description: This spell creates an invisible, mindless, shapeless force that performs simple tasks at your command.

WarlockSpells.Name: Darkness
WarlockSpells.Description: Magical darkness spreads from a point you choose within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Enthrall
WarlockSpells.Description: You weave a distracting string of words, causing creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear you to make a Wisdom saving throw.

WarlockSpells.Name: Hold Person
WarlockSpells.Description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

WarlockSpells.Name: Invisibility
WarlockSpells.Description: A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends.

WarlockSpells.Name: Mirror Image
WarlockSpells.Description: Three illusory duplicates of yourself appear in your space.

WarlockSpells.Name: Misty Step
WarlockSpells.Description: Briefly surrounded by silvery mist, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see.

WarlockSpells.Name: Ray of Enfeeblement
WarlockSpells.Description: A black beam of enervating energy springs from your finger toward a creature within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Shatter
WarlockSpells.Description: A sudden loud ringing noise, painfully intense, erupts from a point of your choice within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Spider Climb
WarlockSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch gains the ability to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings.

WarlockSpells.Name: Suggestion
WarlockSpells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence a creature you can see within range that can hear and understand you.

WarlockSpells.Name: Counterspell
WarlockSpells.Description: You attempt to interrupt a creature in the process of casting a spell.

WarlockSpells.Name: Dispel Magic
WarlockSpells.Description: Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any spell of 3rd level or lower on the target ends.

WarlockSpells.Name: Fear
WarlockSpells.Description: You project a phantasmal image of a creature's worst fears.

WarlockSpells.Name: Fly
WarlockSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature. The target gains a flying speed of 60 feet for the duration.

WarlockSpells.Name: Gaseous Form
WarlockSpells.Description: You transform a willing creature you touch, along with everything it's wearing and carrying, into a misty cloud.

WarlockSpells.Name: Hypnotic Pattern
WarlockSpells.Description: You create a twisting pattern of colors that weaves through the air inside a 30-foot cube within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Magic Circle
WarlockSpells.Description: You create a 10-foot-radius, 20-foot-tall cylinder of magical energy centered on a point on the ground that you can see within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Major Image
WarlockSpells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 20-foot cube.

WarlockSpells.Name: Remove Curse
WarlockSpells.Description: At your touch, all curses affecting one creature or object end.

WarlockSpells.Name: Tongues
WarlockSpells.Description: This spell grants the creature you touch the ability to understand any spoken language it hears.

WarlockSpells.Name: Vampiric Touch
WarlockSpells.Description: The touch of your shadow-wreathed hand can siphon life force from others to heal your wounds.

WarlockSpells.Name: Banishment
WarlockSpells.Description: You attempt to send one creature that you can see within range to another plane of existence.

WarlockSpells.Name: Blight
WarlockSpells.Description: Necromantic energy washes over a creature of your choice that you can see within range, draining moisture and vitality from it.

WarlockSpells.Name: Dimension Door
WarlockSpells.Description: You teleport yourself from your current location to any other spot within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Hallucinatory Terrain
WarlockSpells.Description: You make natural terrain in a 150-foot cube in range look, sound, and even smell like some other sort of natural terrain.

WarlockSpells.Name: Contact Other Plane
WarlockSpells.Description: You mentally contact a demigod, the spirit of a long-dead sage, or some other mysterious entity from another plane.

WarlockSpells.Name: Dream
WarlockSpells.Description: This spell shapes a creature's dreams.

WarlockSpells.Name: Hold Monster
WarlockSpells.Description: Choose a creature that you can see within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Scrying
WarlockSpells.Description: You can see and hear a particular creature you choose that is on the same plane of existence as you.

WarlockSpells.Name: Circle of Death
WarlockSpells.Description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out in a 60-foot-radius sphere from a point within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Conjure Fey
WarlockSpells.Description: You summon a fey creature of challenge rating 6 or lower, or a fey spirit that takes the form of a beast of challenge rating 6 or lower.

WarlockSpells.Name: Create Undead
WarlockSpells.Description: You can cast this spell only at night.

WarlockSpells.Name: Eyebite
WarlockSpells.Description: Each creature in a 60-foot cone must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by one of the following effects of your choice for the duration.

WarlockSpells.Name: Flesh to Stone
WarlockSpells.Description: You attempt to turn one creature that you can see within range into stone.

WarlockSpells.Name: Mass Suggestion
WarlockSpells.Description: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence up to twelve creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear and understand you.

WarlockSpells.Name: True Seeing
WarlockSpells.Description: This spell gives the willing creature you touch the ability to see things as they actually are.

WarlockSpells.Name: Etherealness
WarlockSpells.Description: You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, in the area where it overlaps with your current plane.

WarlockSpells.Name: Finger of Death
WarlockSpells.Description: You send negative energy coursing through a creature that you can see within range, causing it searing pain.

WarlockSpells.Name: Forcecage
WarlockSpells.Description: An immobile, invisible, cube-shaped prison composed of magical force springs into existence around an area you choose within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Plane Shift
WarlockSpells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures who link hands in a circle are transported to a different plane of existence.

WarlockSpells.Name: Demiplane
WarlockSpells.Description: You create a shadowy door on a flat solid surface that you can see within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Dominate Monster
WarlockSpells.Description: You attempt to beguile a creature that you can see within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Feeblemind
WarlockSpells.Description: You blast the mind of a creature that you can see within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Glibness
WarlockSpells.Description: Until the spell ends, when you make a Charisma check, you can replace the number you roll with a 15.

WarlockSpells.Name: Power Word Stun
WarlockSpells.Description: You speak a word of power that can overwhelm the mind of one creature you can see within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Astral Projection
WarlockSpells.Description: You and up to eight willing creatures within range project your astral bodies into the Astral Plane.

WarlockSpells.Name: Foresight
WarlockSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature and bestow a limited ability to see into the immediate future.

WarlockSpells.Name: Imprisonment
WarlockSpells.Description: You create a magical restraint to hold a creature that you can see within range.

WarlockSpells.Name: Power Word Kill
WarlockSpells.Description: You utter a word of power that can compel one creature you can see within range to die instantly.

WarlockSpells.Name: True Polymorph
WarlockSpells.Description: Choose one creature or nonmagical object that you can see within range.
